title: Ahoy! The Top Five Movies Set at Sea | The Big Picture
description:
We needed a bigger boat to select the finest movies set on the great ocean blue, so Chris Ryan returns to aid Sean and Amanda. They each choose their top five films, talk about why they love the sea, and what scares them most about it. This conversation got out of hand.
Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Chris Ryan

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
